localization

Class Localizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • localization.Localizer

  • public class Localizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Localize using a known map. Once completed, the OdometeryPoseProvider passed in during instantiation will be corrected to a known point.
    Author:
    Scott Cooper

    • Constructor Detail

      • Localizer

        public Localizer(DifferentialPilot pilot,
                 UltrasonicSensor us_scanner,
                 OdometryPoseProvider odo)
        Create a new localizer. The class extends MCLPoseProvider by interfacing the 'Main' class to acquire the necessary maps
        Parameters:
        pilot - The DifferentialPilot used to move
        us_scanner - The RangeScanner used to acquire movements
        odo - The OdometryPoseProvider to correct
